pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing DAS Data Files // Process and summarize DAS data files. These files are typically, but do not have to be DAS https://swfsc- publications.fisheries.noaa.gov/publications/TM/SWFSC/NOAA-TM- NMFS-SWFSC-305.PDF data produced by the Southwest Fisheries Science Center (SWFSC) program 'WinCruz'. This package standardizes and streamlines basic DAS data processing, and includes a PDF with the DAS data format requirements expected by the package.
